properties.name: Electron
properties.comment: equal to value for 0.5H2(g), since reaction value for H2(g) = H<+> + e<-> is equal to zero (convention). Exact value for molar mass is 0.00054857990943. It was rounded to eight digits. ; referencestate: aqueous
